item.description:
This is a fun place to hang on a summers night, they have a huge deck to chill on while you wait for the band to set up.

 

Come down to eat or just dance its your night!! so it's your choice :-))))),,lots and lots of dancing room, huge bar for those lovely summer time Martinis to slurp down, or how about huge glass of VINO!!! Ikes we might need the shuttle bus,,lol!!!! Hey I'm on vacation so I am gonna have a blast!!! Great food to wash the stuff down, dress is casual/comfy!! For you hungry guys come early and help me grab some tables, the back area to the left is a good spot to fit a huge group, In any case will leave my cell on.

 

Band: Last Kid Picked

Time 7-2am
item.name: Live Band "Last Kid Picked"
